text: MSC Malaysia, formerly the Multimedia Super Corridor, is a special business zone in Kuala Lumpur, Putrajaya, Selangor, and parts of Negeri Sembilan. Launched by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad on 12 February 1996, it aimed to help Malaysia become a modern, knowledge-based country by 2020.Jeong Chun Hai @Ibrahim, & Nor Fadzlina Nawi. (2007). Principles of Public Administration: An Introduction. Kuala Lumpur: Karisma Publications. Jeong Chun Hai @Ibrahim. (2007). Fundamental of Development Administration. Selangor: Scholar Press. == References == Category:Mahathir Mohamad
title: MSC Malaysia
